titleStmt.title: A declaration from the Generall and Council of State to incite all the good people of these nations to thankfullness and holy rejoycing in the Lord, for the late great victory at sea, obtained by the fleet of this Common-wealth against the Dutch, upon Thursday and Friday being the second and third of June 1653.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Council of State.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Giles Calvert, Henry Hills, and Thomas Brewster,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
